data.title: Marius Pharmaceuticals | LinkedIn
data.snippet:
# Marius Pharmaceuticals
Targeting Endocrine Balance
Pharmaceutical Manufacturing â€¢ Raleigh, North Carolina â€¢ 3,154 followers â€¢ 11-50 employees

## Overview
Marius Pharmaceuticals strives to better the lives of men and women by focusing on therapies designed for hypogonadism or Testosterone Deficiency. Our vision is to holistically improve metabolic health and mitigate significant unnecessary costs to the global healthcare system.

### Website

### Crunchbase

### LinkedIn

### Industry
Pharmaceutical Manufacturing

### Company Size
11-50 employees  
20 associated members (LinkedIn members who've listed Marius Pharmaceuticals as their current workplace on their profile)

### Founded
2017 [...] in welcoming these accomplished experts to the Marius team. #MariusPharmaceuticals Elizabeth Mobley Leah Millheiser, MD, MSCP Dr. Gabrielle Lyon Tara Scott, MD Elizabeth Yurth, MD, ABAARM, FAARM, FAARFM Dr Poonam Desai Alexis Yoo Jessica Yih Doreen Saltiel [Likes: 28, Comments: 1] [...] Marius Pharmaceuticals (1w): Marius Pharmaceuticals is pleased to announce the initiation of a new post-marketing clinical study evaluating KYZATREXÂ® (testosterone undecanoate) CIII capsules in men ages 65â€“80 with hypogonadism. As the population of older men continues to grow, understanding how testosterone deficiency intersects with aging-related health changes is increasingly important. This study will assess quality of life and key health markersâ€”including cardiovascular parameters, body composition, strength-related measures, and inflammationâ€”while also exploring a simplified once-daily dosing regimen. This research reflects Marius Pharmaceuticalsâ€™ ongoing commitment to advancing evidence-based insights in menâ€™s health and supporting clinicians in caring for patients across all stages
